name: Israel
startIntroPart1: Oh Great King David, The Jewish People call for your return, May you bring peace, prosperity and force if you must, oh great King of Israel
startIntroPart2: You who have brought Israel into light, You must bring once more into it!
declaringWar: It seems peace wasnt an option
attacked: I will show you why WE WERE CHOSEN!!
introduction: Welcome all, i bring peace to you and your people.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Happiness] per [4] population [in all cities]
